segments.text: I see the girl standing there, waiting for her brother to give her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems so innocent, just wanting a treat, but encouraging her brother to take risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she realizes how dangerous it is for him to be standing on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her posture is so expectant, her hand reaching up towards the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a bit angry that she's not trying to stop him or find a safer way to get the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's just standing there, seemingly unaware of the potential danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice her attention is completely focused on the cookies, not on the precarious situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she's just a child, not fully understanding the risks involved.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But still, it's frustrating to see her encouraging her brother's risky behavior.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they both learn a lesson about safety from this experience.
segments.speaker: PAR
